captions.text: I got curious

I want to know what you feel like 
What your lips taste like

With so many thoughts in mind 
I dream of an unknown world
My heart got hot

In my hear your temperature will
go up as well
It’s the first time feeling like this

An energy called you 
are opening my heart

There are no good enough word in this 
World to describe you
Not in this world

That beautiful flower I know might 
Die off when it sees you

You are more mysterious 
than the universe
You are so fatally beautiful

Dizzy dizzy, I feel like fainting 
It feels electric

My eyes are following 
you without myself noticing

This is probably what they call destiny
Can’t explain in another way

Nothing in this 
world I’m living in

Will know the 
way I feel about you

You are more mysterious 
than the universe
You are so fatally beautiful

Dizzy dizzy, I feel like fainting 
It feels electric
My eyes are following you

Thinking about hugging 
you makes me feel restless
That feeling that you don’t’ know

You are more mysterious 
than the universe

You are so fatally beautiful 
Dizzy dizzy, I feel like fainting

I’ll go to you, take my hand and 
Hug you
I don’t know
Please come to my arms now

Love you Need you
Feelings that are rushing to me
Curio-us

comments.text:
궁금해졌어 니 감촉이 
갖고 싶어진 니 입술은 어떤 맛일까?
밤새도록 많은 생각에 꿔버린 내 꿈속은 미지의 세계

뜨거워졌어 내 심장이 
내 품속에서 니 체온은 뜨거울거야
처음이야 이런 기분은, 너라는 에너지가 내 맘을 여네

너를 표현하는 멋진 낱말들이
세상엔 없어, 어디도 없어
내가 알고 있는 아름다운 꽃도
널 보고 나면 시들해 질까

우주탐험보다 너는 신비로워
치명적인 니가 너무 아름다워
어지러 어지러 아찔해져 난
니 앞에선 자꾸 짜릿해 내 눈은 너를 향하고 있어 나도 몰래

운명이란 말은 이럴 때 하겠지
또 다른 말론 설명이 안돼
내가 알고 있는 이 세상 무엇도
널 보는 이런 내 맘을 알까

우주탐험보다 너는 신비로워
치명적인 니가 너무 아름다워
어지러 어지러 아찔해져 난
니 앞에선 자꾸 짜릿해 내 눈은 너를 향하고 있어 

숨이 차올라 널 안아보는 상상에 우~
너만 몰래 느껴보는 그 느낌 아~

우주탐험보다 너는 신비로워
치명적인 니가 너무 아름다워
어지러 어지러 아찔해져 난
다가가서 손을 가로채 내 품에 너를 힘껏 안겠어 나도 몰라

그래 이젠 내게 안겨줄래
Love you, Need you 떨려오는 기분 우
(사랑해, 니가 필요해)


﻿

comments.text:
I like the song, it's got that old school, best of disco feel, but my wife 
would hate it. I can practically hear her now bemoaning how cheesy it is 
and whining, "Do we HAVE to listen to this?" Don't get me wrong, I'm ok 
with that, since I've always been the one in the relationship with a 
broader range of tastes, but this is one song we won't be slow jamming to 
together.
